comments.text: Thank you for your update. I am following your first video and I have 100 completed now. I am looking forward to putting  them together soon, just need to think of a border. Not tried anything complicated yet but who knows what will be next.

comments.text:
Thanks so much  Em, your tutorials are awesome.

You explain everything so well, covering each point and the reasons why.

This will help a lot of budding crocheters, to produce top class solid granny squares.

The "invisible join" is a definite winner for quality  finishing joins.

I also love the corner's single chain & single crochet technique too.

Hope you are doing well ❤.
